message.body: Steve I think I'm freaking out!
My car'a gone!
What do you mean it's gone?
It's been stolen. I just talked to the police.
Holy crap... Where are you?
I'm at home. Steve I feel sick, I can't believe this is happening. I looked out the window last night to check if it was there, and it was! I went to look out earlier and it's gone. Oh my god!
So what's gonna happen now? What did the cops say?
So, he took a report. He's going to pass it on to the detectives.
I called my insurance company, they filed a claim.
Now I have to wait force adjuster to contact me.
* for the
Did the detective give you any probability of finding it? What will insurance do in the mean time for you to driver
*drive?
The officer said to give the detective a call in two days.
I have rental coverage. Just called Enterprise about a reservation. This is ridiculous. I had a car and now I'm looking into car rental. Why????
Did you see any shattered glass or anything around where it was last parked?
I actually went to check, there was no glass.
Steve I didn't even tell my mom, she is going to freaaaak out.
:/ you're going to have to. You did everything right though. It's not your fault, someone stole your car...
Are you alright?
Yea, I'm just feeling tired now from today. Told my mom. How are you?
How did she take it? I'm alright. Worried about you.
Thanks. She reacted more or less like I expected. She was shocked.
As anyone should be.
Do you need anything?
I'm okay. Thank you. Today has not been a good day.
:/ I hope everything works out.
Me too :)
So how has the rest of your week been?
Pretty uneventful. You?
Just work. Have you heard back from that place yet?
Not yet.
I'm actually not minding that they're taking their time. Especially after today. One thing at a time right now.
Yeah, I don't blame you. Try to relax. It's just a waiting game now.
Yup, all this stuff is out of my hands.
You checked to make sure your car wasn't towed right?
Yup, multiple times.
:/ man... I wish there was something I could do..
Oh no, you've done enough. There's not much that anyone could do, well besides the cops and such. Thanks for saying that though!
Must bribe the cops.... With donuts!!!!
Hahahahahahahahah! Thanks for that, that made me smile.
:) I'm glad. You can have a donut now too.
Man I could go for a donut right now. Need some sugar.
I still have my cookies! You're welcome to them too :)
Yes! Eat cookies. Now I'm hungry
Eat cookies!
